# ğŸ“Š Automated Data Visualization System

An interactive and intelligent data-visualization web app built using **React + Vite**.  
This tool transforms raw CSV files into meaningful visual charts, insights, and reports â€” all within seconds.

---

## âœ¨ Features

### ğŸ“‚ Upload CSV Files  
Easily upload your dataset and instantly visualize the contents.

### ğŸ“Š Auto-Generated Charts  
- Creates data charts automatically  
- Supports **single or multiple charts**  
- Includes a **Select All** charts option for instant visualization

### ğŸ§  Smart Insights  
Generates insights from your uploaded dataset, helping users quickly understand trends and key points.

### ğŸ“‘ Downloadable Reports  
Exports a professionally structured report **including visuals**, summaries, and insights.

### ğŸ–¥ï¸ Clean & Interactive UI  
A smooth and minimal interface designed to make exploring data easy and intuitive.

---

## ğŸš€ Tech Stack

- **React.js** (Frontend)
- **Vite** (Ultra-fast development + build tool)
- **Chart.js and Recharts**
- **Custom logic for insights + CSV parsing**

## ğŸ“¦ Installation & Setup

### 1ï¸âƒ£ Clone the repository
```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/your-repo-name.git
cd your-repo-name
```

### 2ï¸âƒ£ Install dependencies
```bash
npm install
```

### 3ï¸âƒ£ Start the development server
```bash
npm run dev
```
Your app will be available at the local URL generated by Vite, usually:
```
http://localhost:5173
```
